Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda.The text reads "As for reactionary propaganda materials that have been sent or carried by the Taiwan authorities, do not disseminate them and hand them over immediately."One of the labels on the crate reads Hong Kong.
